data.title: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure (Sep 30, 2002 prototype)
data.meta_description: A prototype of Rygar: The Legendary Adventure for the PlayStation 2.
data.text:
Download Rygar: The Legendary Adventure (Sep 30, 2002 prototype) (info) Error: The download file provided does not exist, please upload it or fix the file name if it's incorrect. Download Rygar: The Legendary Adventure (Sep 30, 2002 prototype) from external mirror

A prototype of Rygar: The Legendary Adventure for the PlayStation 2.

Notes

Compiled approximately 38 days before the US and Japanese retail versions.

Miscellaneous Notes:

Game is emulatable (in PCSX2): Yes (as of March 17, 2021).

Game contains dongle protection: No.

Disc front.
